statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (2,-2) and (9,15).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{15}-{\left(-{2}\right)}}}{{{9}-{\left({2}\right)}}}=\frac{{17}}{{7}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{17}}{{7}} (if it's not already reduced)
